description: User files a kitchen countertop damage claim using an image and contractor estimate; the assistant retrieves the policy, extracts incident details via OCR, populates the claim form, predicts approval likelihood, submits the claim, and returns the claim reference with status.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve policy information, extract details from images, populate claim forms, predict approval chances, and submit claims on behalf of the user.

My policy number is 123456789. A pipe burst in my kitchen and damaged the countertop. I have a photo of the damage here: https://example.com/photos/kitchen_countertop.jpg and a contractor estimate of $4,200. Can you file the claim for me?
Thanks for the details. I’ll first retrieve your policy, then run OCR on the photo to capture the damage description, and finally incorporate your contractor estimate.
{"extracted_text":"Water damage to kitchen countertop observed. Approximate area 20 sq ft. Cracks and discoloration visible. Date of incident: 2025-11-20.","key_value_pairs":{}}
I have your policy and the damage description from the photo. I’ll now build the claim form using this information and the contractor estimate you provided.

incident_details.description: Water burst pipe caused damage to kitchen countertop. Approx. 20 sq ft affected, with cracks and discoloration.

messages.content: {"claim_form_id":"CF-20251121-001","policy_number":"123456789","holder_name":"Jane Doe","incident_date":"2025-11-20","incident_location":"Residence – Kitchen","damage_description":"Water burst pipe caused damage to kitchen countertop. Approx. 20 sq ft affected, with cracks and discoloration.","estimated_loss_usd":4200,"photos":["https://example.com/photos/kitchen_countertop.jpg"],"deductible":500,"coverage_type":"Homeowners"}
The claim form is ready. I’ll now predict the likelihood of approval before we submit it.

claim_form.damage_description: Water burst pipe caused damage to kitchen countertop. Approx. 20 sq ft affected, with cracks and discoloration.

messages.content: The model estimates an 88 % chance of approval. The main risk factors are the deductible amount being close to the loss estimate and a recent claim on this policy. Shall I go ahead and submit the claim?

claim_form.damage_description: Water burst pipe caused damage to kitchen countertop. Approx. 20 sq ft affected, with cracks and discoloration.

messages.content:
Your claim has been successfully submitted! 🎉
- **Claim ID:** CLM-20251121-7890
- **Current Status:** Submitted (awaiting review)
- **Estimated approval probability:** 88 %
- **Next steps:** An adjuster may contact you within 3‑5 business days for any additional information. You can check the claim status anytime by asking me.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
